text:
e="preserve">Ray Lovelock (; 19 June 1950 – 10 November 2017) was an Italian actor and rock musician. He was born in Rome, Italy. He performed in a rock band with longtime friend and actor Tomas Milian, where he was discovered by a talent agent.
Lovelock appeared in many movies such as: "Fiddler on the Roof" (1971), "Let Sleeping Corpses Lie" (1974), "Almost Human" (1974), "Violent Rome" (1975), "Live Like a Cop, Die Like a Man" (1976), "The Cassandra Crossing" (1976) and "The Last House on the Beach" (1978).
Lovelock died in Trevi, Italy on 10 November 2017 of bone cancer at the age of 67.

annotations.surface_form: Live Like a Cop, Die Like a Man
The Last House on the Beach
